The USDA has approved Montana for a new Pandemic EBT program! All Harlem Public Schools students qualify for this program, if they were between 5 and 18 and enrolled on March 18, 2020.

DPHHS has asked for our help in collecting information on qualified students, who are NOT already enrolled with SNAP. The following release form was mailed today (July 10th) to non-SNAP students. If you are already enrolled with SNAP, you will automatically be enrolled in the P-EBT program.

This form must be received at the Business Office no later than July 16th. They can be returned via USPS (if they will arrive by 7/16), fax (353-2674) or email (lorio@harlem-hs.k12.mt.us). Parents/guardians are also welcome to stop by the office to fill one out or request that one be emailed or faxed to you.

Please note that we cannot release your students' information to DPHHS for this program without the signed release. For more information, please contact Lori Owens at 353-2289.
